title: Pool Party week goals being set too high?
body:
To be quite honest, I really don't think we're going to get past even level 3. After 2 days we've gotten what seems to be around 8 million points and if we keep up the same pace we won't even get Level 4, maybe Riot could scale the recommendations down somewhat so the goals are a little more attainable.

EDIT: After day 3, I'm quite surprised we almost got Level 2.

Well. According to the wiki, over 27 Million people play league everyday. So if everyone just played 2 games with a team of 5, we would reach the level 5 goal in a day. 

So if everyone would just go out of their way to try and play at least two 5-man games this week, they would be doing their part to work towards the goal. 

I have to admit, I am a little disappointed in how few people are willing to work towards the Pool Party, but I think we can turn it around in the next few days if we all work to do our part. It only takes 1 person to get people together for a 5-man team. Talk to those you queue up with and ask them to team up with you for the next one (it doesn't have to be a ranked game). Even just playing an ARAM game with a team works towards the Pool Party. The average time for a game in ARAM is about 20 minutes, so it's great to spam a few games with your 5-man to add points towards the goal. 

To anyone who reads this, I hope you will try and make a team to at least play 2 games with, more is better, but any game you can get in will be very appreciated. I know we can do this. Good luck out there. Peace.
